name: Cower Tower (Gonbad, green.mermaid)
description:
*Play in fullscreen for best experience*

Cower Tower is a randomly generated adventure game inspired heavily by The Binding of Isaac. You can only get hurt by what you see, and what you don't see is not real. There are 5 levels with varying enemies, each passed by defeating a boss situated in a large room with a black button in its center.

Have fun and please leave feedback, it is greatly appreciated! ^^

CONTROLS:

Mouse click - move and attack enemies once the spikes are activated

E - open doors or trapdoors

Space (hold) - keep eyes closed to stop time for everything except the movement of the player

UPGRADES:

Health upgrade

Damage Upgrade

Fire Upgrade: increase damage and knockback

Ice Upgrade: slow enemies down

Health Potion: recover hp
